articles.title: 'My dog bit me 25 times but breed is safe and I even let mine live with my kids' - The Mirror
articles.description: WARNING - GRAPHIC IMAGES: Stephanie Jones, 32, from near Swansea, south Wales, had two American Bullies and had to have one put down after it mauled her - but she insists each dog is different and it is not the breed
articles.content:
A dog owner bitten 25 times in a horrific American Bully attack claims the breed is not dangerous - and lets her three young children still live with one.
